hero.intro1: Hi and welcome to my personal web page!
hero.intro2: I'm Dennis Turco, born on 08/04/2001 in Fidenza (a small town in the province of Parma, Italy), where I currently live.
hero.education: I hold a degree in Computer Science from the University of Parma.
hero.passion: I'm passionate about technology and constantly eager to learn and explore new challenges.
hero.team: I love working in teams but I'm also perfectly capable of working independently.

work_consegne.description: Worked on-call as a delivery driver.

work_universita.description: Graduated in Computer Science with a score of 100/110.

work_superprof.description: Providing private lessons in Mathematics and Programming.

work_insegnantecoordinatore.title: Teacher and Coordinator

work_tirocinio.description: Developed a .NET MVC 6.0 web application using C#, SQL, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

simfinance.title: Sim Finance
simfinance.description: Website developed as a tool to simulate retirement outcomes based on your personal financial situation.

remindme.title: Remind Me
remindme.description: This program, with a modern customized graphical interface, allows you to schedule recurring reminders. It features an elegant and contemporary design, combining refinement with friendliness.

fusaecaffe.title: Fusa & Caffè
fusaecaffe.description: Dynamic website developed in Next.js to showcase Fusa & Caffè’s magical place for enjoying good coffee in the company of cats.

backupmanager.title: Backup Manager
backupmanager.description: This program with a modern graphical interface allows you to automatically back up folders and subfolders.

calendardatamanager.title: Calendar Data Manager
calendardatamanager.description: This program, with a simple graphical interface, lets you efficiently manage Google Calendar events.

appuntifacili.title: Appunti Facile
appuntifacili.description: Website dedicated to publishing documentation aimed at explaining programming and math concepts clearly and concisely.

minesweeper.title: Minesweeper Game
minesweeper.description: Classic Minesweeper game implemented in Java.

services.title: My Services
services.subtitle: I offer advanced skills in software development, website creation, and programming training.

softwaredeveloper.title: Software Development
softwaredeveloper.description: I offer custom software development services tailored to your needs, using languages such as Java and C#. I create scalable, high-performance, and secure applications, ensuring clean and maintainable code.

webdeveloper.title: Web Development
webdeveloper.description: I build modern, responsive websites using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as Next.js. I ensure high performance, SEO optimization, and attractive design.

teacher.title: Programming Instructor
teacher.description: I share my experience teaching programming to students and professionals. I offer personalized lessons on Java, C#, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other technologies, both online and in person.
